title: Soul Sand
desc:
Post 1819
- This card is of the Soil subtype.
- This card takes 2 hits to break with a tool that is not meant for it.
- Once you move here, you must spend at least one turn before you can leave unless (1821) Soul Speed is active.
- Each turn that you stand here, you will draw an **Ethereal** <:gloom:1187518684143550605> card.
